QuestData.Title: Just Some Light Clean-Up Work
QuestData.Description: This is not a glamorous job. Let me put it to you bluntly.$b$bThe Skumblade saurok pile all of their filth into a pool in the middle of their village. This filth is so concentrated and so rancid that it has congealed into moving, animate matter.$b$bThe saurok can keep their filth-pool, but once it starts spreading outside of the village, I'd say it's time to intervene.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disperse 75 pieces of filth by killing Quivering Filth in Ihgaluk Crag.
